about_the_game:
Chess President
A duel between darkness and light!
White piece: Refers to the power of the bright world - justice.
Black piece: Refers to the power of the dark world - authority.
Game origin: time - 21st century, place - east, Dominate the world.
piece Relations: Society - Moral, Economic - Legal, City{Country} - Power.Justice.
Board borders: black and white, inside and outside.
Children grow up: heroes - angels, demons - monsters.
Out of bounds prohibited: Society-Economy-City, Morality-Law-Power-Justice.
Don't eat piece: Morality-law-power-justice {can't eat directly}.
victory or defeat: Country has crashed {city}.

Piece: [Piece = humanity]
1-Child 2-People 3-Wise Man 4-Grown Ups 5-Saint
6-Hero or Angel , Demon or Monster
7-Society or Economy 8-City
9-Law or Morality 10-Politics(Power or Justice)


ChessBoard: [ChessBoard = Nature]
1-Country 2-Home 3-Border


llevel:
1~6 Defense.
1~6 attacks.
1~3 weak to medium strong defense.
1~3 Weak to medium strong attack.
1 Modern Warfare, 1 Ancient Warfare.

Features:
-- Upgrade the chess game.
-- 3 difficulty levels.
-- Great soundtrack.
-- 2 Teams.
-- Everything you need in a chess game.
-- New ideas for board games.
-- Timer control game time.
-- You can play against AI or yourself.

victory or defeat：
-- kill city pawns.

name: Chess President

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A duel between darkness and light!
